name: @tak-nz/base-infra
description: Base infrastructure for TAK-NZ projects using AWS CDK

scripts.clean: rm -f bin/*.js bin/*.d.ts lib/*.js lib/*.d.ts test/*.js test/*.d.ts; rm -rf cdk.out/*
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy --context env=dev-test
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy --context env=prod
scripts.synth:dev: npm run build && cdk synth --context env=dev-test
scripts.synth:prod: npm run build && cdk synth --context env=prod
scripts.cdk:diff:dev: npm run build && cdk diff --context env=dev-test
scripts.cdk:diff:prod: npm run build && cdk diff --context env=prod
